modalViews.label: Manage Extensions Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you install and manage zEdit extensions such as themes and modules.

modalViews.label: Help Modal
modalViews.description: Provides documentation and information about zEdit.

modalViews.label: Profiles Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to set the default profile, create new profiles, and edit or remove existing profiles.

modalViews.label: Load Order Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to select the load order to load.  Opens automatically when you start a new session.

modalViews.label: Settings Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to view and global settings and settings for the current profile.

modalViews.label: Automate Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to create, manage, and run scripts.

modalViews.label: Edit Columns Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to manage the columns that are displayed on the view, including creating custom columns.

modalViews.label: Edit Value Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to edit record values.

modalViews.label: Edit Columns Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to manage the columns that are displayed on the view, including creating custom columns.

modalViews.label: Edit Merge Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to set the name, filename, merge method, and plugins for a merge.  Also allows you to view and adjust how data files will be handled when the merge is built.

modalViews.label: Resolve Modal
modalViews.description: Allows you to select resolutions for errors.

children.label: Paths
children.description: Information about how xelib handles paths.

children.label: Meta
children.description: Library-specific functions for tasks such as getting globals and managing handles.

children.label: Messages
children.description: Log and exception messages in the library.

children.label: Element Values
children.description: Functions for getting or settings values on elements.

children.label: File Values
children.description: Functions for handling groups in files.

children.label: Records
children.description: Functions for handling records in files.

children.label: Record Values
children.description: Functions for getting values from records.

children.label: Masters
children.description: Functions for handling masters in files.

children.label: Groups
children.description: Functions for handling groups in files.

children.label: Serialization
children.description: Functions for serializing elements to JSON and deserializing them from JSON.

children.label: Plugin Errors
children.description: Functions for getting and resolving errors/dirty edits in plugin files.
